statements: SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM Appointments WHERE consultation_reason LIKE '%checkup%'
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-08-15' AND reminder_sent = TRUE
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND reminder_sent = FALSE
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, reminder_sent FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE consultation_reason LIKE '%checkup%';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, consultation_reason FROM Appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE AND appointment_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT appointment_type FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type='Checkup';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE status='Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Consultation' AND status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
SELECT appointments.*, reminders.reminder_date, reminders.reminder_message FROM appointments INNER JOIN reminders ON appointments.appointment_id = reminders.appointment_id;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Completed' GROUP BY doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments
SELECT doctor_id, appointment_date, patient_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_id
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled'
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr%' ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, email_address FROM patients WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_email FROM doctors WHERE doctor_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_time DESC, appointment_id

SELECT doctor_name, appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM appointments INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointment_time > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_time

SELECT patient_name, patient_email, doctor_name FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY patient_name

SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, reminder_date FROM appointments INNER JOIN reminders ON appointments.appointment_id = reminders.appointment_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY reminder_date DESC

SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, reminder_type, reminder_date FROM appointments INNER JOIN reminders ON appointments.appointment_id = reminders.appointment_id INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY patient_name, reminder_date
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM consultation_notes WHERE doctor_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointments.appointment_date, doctors.name, patients.name FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.id;
SELECT reminders.id, reminders.appointment_id, appointments.appointment_date FROM reminders JOIN appointments ON reminders.appointment_id = appointments.id;
